Plot: A sex comedy centered on a serial womanizer and his jilted lover.
Title: Spread
Writer: Jason Hall (screenplay), Jason Hall (story), Paul Kolsby (story)
Actors: Ashton Kutcher, Anne Heche, Margarita Levieva, Sebastian Stan
tomatoConsensus: Despite occasional detours into surprisingly dark territory, Spread overall is an ineffectual celebration of vacuous Los Angeles high life rather than a deconstruction of it.
